description: This file is the entry server component for a Remix-based web application, handling server-side rendering and request processing including bot detection and HTTP response management.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, detects bots using user-agent, and delegates to bot or browser request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests using React's streaming API, returning a streamed HTML response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests with streaming, similar to handleBotRequest.
